name: HEELium Balloons
overview:
Customized balloon decorations, centrepieces, gift arrangements, and more…

This is an event decoration business called HEELium Balloons.

At HEELium Balloons we do balloon centrepieces, balloon arches and specialty balloon designs such as balloon columns, balloon numbers, balloon letters and cake table decorations.

Plus we deliver and make the designs on site. We can make any venue look amazing with our unique and innovative designs!

We are also offering a 10% discount for every referral.

For more information feel free to contact us at:

sarah@heeliumballoons.com (416) 904-7778 www.heeliumballoons.com
